item.title: Joining test coverage from several test directories
item.author: diegojromerolopez@gmail.com (Diego J. Romero-López)
item.description: Joining test coverage from several test directories This post show a simple way of computing the coverage.py’s test coverage from different tests folders. Introduction I have been using coverage.py since I started working with python, and while it works pretty well, let us say that the interface of the command line tool could be better. I struggled for some minutes trying to filter out other folder I have in my tests folder that were not meant to have their test coverage computed.
